comment: CPU God: best CPU implementation (OpenMP+SIMD/MIPP). Evaluated with: ./bin/murb -n 30000 -i 200 -v --nv --im cpu+omp
I'm the fastest in the World!: full-GPU CUDA kernel (tile+full). Evaluated with: ./bin/murb -n 500000 -i 200 -v --nv --im gpu+tile+full
CUDA Guru: CUDA kernel variant tuned for medium-size N. Evaluated with: ./bin/murb -n 200000 -i 200 -v --nv --im gpu+tile+full200k

I'm an artist!: Move Your Body Cyberpunk visualization implemented in src/common/ogl/OGLSpheresVisuGS.cpp (procedural palette + beatPulse sync). Run any implem with visualization enabled (remove --nv).
Heterogeneous CPU+GPU offload controlled by MURB_HETERO_GPU_FRACTION. Example run: export MURB_HETERO_GPU_FRACTION=0.75; ./bin/murb -n 30000 -i 60 -v --nv --im hetero
MPI prototype (single node): Allgatherv global state + local i-range compute. Example: srun -n 4 ./bin/murb -n 30000 -i 200 -v --nv --im mpi
Baseline reference (naive). Useful for regression/perf comparisons.
Sequential CPU optimization: reduced arithmetic + symmetry/pair update (when applicable).
SIMD vectorized CPU kernel using MIPP (rsqrt + optional NR refinement).
CUDA tiled kernel in shared memory (no full-residency optimization).
Experimental CUDA variant with tracking/instrumentation-oriented changes (not used for main awards).
Experimental CUDA variant exploring leapfrog-style integration / physics-oriented update (not used for main awards).
